results.title: Monsieur Hulot's Holiday
results.creator_credit: Roger Briaucourt, Henri Schmitt, Fred Orain, Jacques Tati and Cady
results.brief_description: Monsieur Hulot, Jacques Tati’s endearing clown, takes a holiday at a seaside resort, where his presence provokes one catastrophe after another. Tati’s masterpiece of gentle slapstick is a series of effortlessly well-choreographed sight gags involving dogs, boats, and firecrackers; it was the first entry in the Hulot series and the film that launched its maker to international stardom.

results.title: Mommy Dead and Dearest
results.brief_description: Child abuse, mental illness, and forbidden love converge in this mystery involving a mother and daughter who were thought to be living a fairy tale life that turned out to be a living nightmare.

constellations_other.name: Auteurs and Yorgos Lanthimos
constellations_other.description: Oscar-winner Sandy Powell crafted Abigail's (Emma Stone) costume in The Favourite to represent her ascension in the royal household of Queen Anne by utilising black and white.

results.title: Molly
results.creator_credit: John Molloy, Liz Doran, M4 Entertainment Production and Mushroom Pictures
results.brief_description: From humble beginnings in Quambatook, Ian Meldrum rose to become the most influential and well known name in Australian music.

constellations_other.name: The secret life of suburbia and music videos
constellations_other.description: Australia's famous streets and suburbs have defined music videos, TV shows and miniseries, providing a unique backdrop to Australian stories and music.

results.title: Modern Times
results.brief_description: The Tramp struggles to live in modern industrial society with the help of a young homeless woman.

constellations_other.name: Cinema to superheroes
constellations_other.description: This Magnaphonic Projector and its double were originally used in the Tallangatta cinema in the 1930s.

results.title: Moana
results.creator_credit: Chris Williams, Don Hall, Hurwitz Creative, Lisa Keane, Ron Clements, Walt Disney Animation Studios and John Musker
results.brief_description: In Ancient Polynesia, when a terrible curse incurred by Maui reaches an impetuous Chieftain’s daughter’s island, she answers the Ocean’s call to seek out the demigod to set things right.

constellations_other.name: Little J & Big Cuz to Blade
constellations_other.description: Discover how some of the best indigenous works connect to comic book blockbusters and martial arts videogames.

constellations_other.name: Go Bang
constellations_other.description: Australian dance act PNAU are renowned for groundbreaking visuals in their music videos, including for their 2017 single 'Go Bang' which featured Kira Divine.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Chris Williams, Don Hall, Hurwitz Creative, Lisa Keane, Ron Clements, Walt Disney Animation Studios and John Musker
results.description:
In ancient Polynesia, the young, soon-to-be-chieftain Moana must enlist the help of the shape-shifting demi-god Maui to find the heart of the goddess Te Fiti, and save her home from encroaching darkness by defying her father and venturing across the sea to confront Te Kā, the volcanic demon who defeated Maui a millennia ago.

Directed by animation legends Ron Clements and John Musker (The Little Mermaid (1989), Aladdin (1992), and featuring the voice talents of Auli’i Cravalho, Dwayne ‘The Rock’ Johnson, Temuera Morrison, Jemaine Clement and Rachel House, as well as songs penned by Hamilton’s Lin-Manuel Miranda, Moana is a breathtaking instant classic from Walt Disney Animation Studios.

This stunning concept art by Lisa Keane explores the budding relationship between baby Moana and the ocean, who becomes an important guide on her adventure.
description_for_label:
In ancient Polynesia, the young, soon-to-be-chieftain Moana must enlist the help of the shape-shifting demi-god Maui to find the heart of the goddess Te Fiti, and save her home from encroaching darkness by defying her father and venturing across the sea to confront Te Kā, the volcanic demon who defeated Maui a millennia ago.

results.title: MLK/FBI
results.creator_credit: Dedalus Wainwright, Sheila Griffin, Benjamin Hedin, Kate Hurwitz, Brian Becker, Laura Tomaselli, Sam Pollard, IFC Films and Field of Vision
results.brief_description: Based on newly declassified files, the film explores the US government’s surveillance and harassment of Martin Luther King, Jr.

constellations_primary.name: MLK/FBI: blackness In America
constellations_primary.description: Award-winning documentarian Sam Pollard looks at J. Edgar Hoover and the FBI’s pursuit of Martin Luther King Jr in the lead-up to his assassination during America’s Civil Rights Movement of the sixties.

results.title: Mission: Impossible - Fallout
results.creator_credit: Paramount, Bad Robot, Skydance Media, TC Productions, Alibaba Pictures Group, Christopher McQuarrie, Bruce Geller, Tom Cruise, J.J. Abrams, Peter Wenham, Dana Goldberg, Jake Myers, Bryan Burk, Don Granger, David Ellison and Raphaël Benoliel
results.headline_credit: China, France, Norway and United States of America, 2018
results.brief_description: When an IMF mission ends badly, the world is faced with dire consequences. As Ethan Hunt takes it upon himself to fulfill his original briefing, the CIA begin to question his loyalty and his motives. The IMF team find themselves in a race against time, hunted by assassins while trying to prevent a global catastrophe.

constellations_other.name: Kylie to Lucy
constellations_other.description: 'Did It Again' started the conversation about Kylie Minogue being more than just a pop star, it started to cement her status as one of the most important audio and visual artists of her time, but the video had an unlikely inspiration.

results.title: Mission: Impossible
results.creator_credit: Barry Crane, Robert H. Justman, Allan Balter, William Woodfield, Joseph Gantman, Desilu Productions and Paramount Television Studios
results.brief_description: Mission: Impossible is an American television series that was created and initially produced by Bruce Geller. It chronicles the missions of a team of secret government agents known as the Impossible Missions Force.

constellations_other.name: Kylie to Lucy
constellations_other.description: 'Did It Again' started the conversation about Kylie Minogue being more than just a pop star, it started to cement her status as one of the most important audio and visual artists of her time, but the video had an unlikely inspiration.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Barry Crane, Robert H. Justman, Allan Balter, William Woodfield, Joseph Gantman, Desilu Productions and Paramount Television Studios
results.description:
Mission: Impossible is an American television series that was created and initially produced by Bruce Geller. It chronicles the missions of a team of secret government agents known as the Impossible Missions Force. In the first season, the team is led by Dan Briggs, played by Steven Hill; Jim Phelps, played by Peter Graves, takes charge for the remaining seasons. A hallmark of the series shows Briggs or Phelps receiving his instructions on a recording that then self-destructs, followed by the theme music composed by Lalo Schifrin.

The series aired on the CBS network from September 1966 to March 1973, then returned to television for two seasons on ABC, from 1988 to 1990, retaining only Graves in the cast. It later inspired a popular series of theatrical motion pictures starring Tom Cruise, beginning in 1996.
description_for_label:

It chronicles the missions of a team of secret government agents known as the Impossible Missions Force. In the first season, the team is led by Dan Briggs, played by Steven Hill; Jim Phelps, played by Peter Graves, takes charge for the remaining seasons. A hallmark of the series shows Briggs or Phelps receiving his instructions on a recording that then self-destructs, followed by the theme music composed by Lalo Schifrin.

The series aired on the CBS network from September 1966 to March 1973, then returned to television for two seasons on ABC, from 1988 to 1990, retaining only Graves in the cast. It later inspired a popular series of theatrical motion pictures starring Tom Cruise, beginning in 1996.

results.title: Mishima: A Life in Four Chapters
results.creator_credit: Mataichirô Yamamoto, Lucasfilm Ltd., American Zoetrope, Tristone Entertainment Inc., M Company, Tom Luddy, Paul Schrader, Leonard Schrader, Catherine Craig, Eiko Ishioka and Etsuko Yagyu
results.headline_credit: Japan and United States of America, 1985
results.brief_description: A fictional account of the life of Japanese author Yukio Mishima told in four parts. The first three parts relate events in three of his novels: The Temple of the Golden Pavilion, Kyoko’s House, and Runaway Horses. The last part depicts the events of 25th November 1970.

results.title: Mindhunter
results.creator_credit: Jim Davidson, Steve Arnold, Jennifer Starzyk, Liz Hannah, Panic Pictures / No. 13, Denver and Delilah Productions and Jen X Productions, Inc.
results.brief_description: An agent in the FBI’s Elite Serial Crime Unit develops profiling techniques as he pursues notorious serial killers and rapists.

constellations_other.name: Eric Bana
constellations_other.description: There must be something that draws Australian creatives like Eric Bana to darker material as they shoot to stardom overseas. Australia's penal colony past perhaps?

constellations_other.name: Assassins: real world manifestations
constellations_other.description: Ryan White’s documentary Assassins breaks down the wild true story of the assassination of North Korea’s Kim John-nam, diving into the political and personal motivations behind the event.
